text: And, oop! Okay.
Okay, first up, food facts.
What's my favorite sandwich?

Mm-mm-mmm.
Let's go with a classic.

- Ready?
- Mm-hmm.

- Turkey. Yeah, you got it.
- Oh! Let's go!

- Spot on.
- I got it right.
You got mine wrong, though.
You got mine wrong.

No, you're both
guessing mine.
What? Oh!

What's my favorite
topping on pizza?

- Ooh. Cheese?
- ( buzzer )
Cheese isn't a topping.

What's my least favorite
topping on pizza?
Okay, I can see your board.

I said pineapple,
because I know a lot of--

- Jalapeno.
- No, I love pineapple.

Oh, you're one of those
pineapple people?

Yeah, I'm not a big
jalapeno person.

Ooh, I don't know
how I feel about that.

Okay, what was
my childhood nickname?

Okay, I know you've
told me this before.

Oh, my gosh.
I'm not going to remember this.
( chuckles )

I'm just going to
shorten your name to Jack.
No. People liked to call me--

Jackie Robinson,
that's the one.

So what is my "childhood"
childhood nickname?

I don't want to write it
because it's not that nice.
No, not that one.

This is like when
I was a baby and a toddler.

I'm just going to go
with what my mom called me.
Peanut?
That's what my mom called me.
Guess I'm not special.

What's my favorite
sport to watch?

I said, "If skateboarding
isn't a sport, than basketball."
What is my favorite sport?
I have three guesses.

I'm very confident
that you won't get this.

Surfing or soccer
or basketball.

Basketball's right.
When's my birthday?
We had it on set.
It's, uh-- hmm.

You had a rock and roll cake,
remember, with the bass on it?

- I did.
- ( buzzer )
It's September 7th, 2005.
Aww! I was close.

You were close.
I will give you partial credit.
That's, like, a .25, actually.

What's my favorite
sport to play or to do?

Don't look at
my bad handwriting.

- Skate. Yep.
- Yep.

- I wrote "skatboarding."
- Skatboarding.
What's my eye color?
Uh...

I said brown with traces
of other colors.

It's hazel green.
My eyes are hazel green.
I see brown, green, and blue.
Yeah, that's hazel green.

What is my favorite
ice cream flavor?

I, like, paint you to be
this kind of a person.
( laughs )

3, 2, 1. Neapolitan?
We have those one set.

- I said mint chip.
- I hate mint chip.

You don't like mint chip?
Last question.

What is my least
favorite food?

Uh, how about, I don't
think you like mushrooms?

- Tomato.
- Oh.
I don't like either of those.

- Good game.
- Yeah, that was fun.
♪ Oh, oh ♪
